dcterms:description: Ciao is a published dataset for social recommendation. The source cites of Ciao allows users to add friends to their ‘Circle of Trust’, and rate items.
dcterms:title: Ciao

dcterms:description: Epinions is a benchmark dataset for the social recommendation. In Epinions, a user can rate and give comments on items. Besides, a user can also select other users as their trusters. Note that we treat the trust graphs as social networks.
dcterms:title: Epinions

dcterms:description: Yelp is an online review platform where users review local businesses (e.g., restaurants and shops). The user-item interactions and the social networks are extracted in the same way as Epinions.
dcterms:title: Yelp
